title: TheCryptoAlpha
author: TheCryptoAlpha
content: Greetings crypto enthusiasts and community, We are MAXX Finance creating a blockchain protocol on the FTM network. I would like to introduce our project, we are creating a staking dapp ecosystem that will be easy to use with a fairly launched system that will allow users to stake and earn yield. The platform will be launching somewhere mid-July and we are welcoming you guys to join our community. We are also looking for people to join our team to help us run live streams, advisors, developers, and anyone else in the community that can be useful to the success of the platform. We are very excited to roll out updates so follow us on telegram t.me/maxxfinanceAlso our linktree https://linktr.ee/maxxfinanceIf you are interested in becoming part of the team please msg t.me/maxxalpha for more information. Thank you!
